trans-unit.source: Represents a digital signature for an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 代表的數位簽章<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use XpsDigitalSignature instead of <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature> when you work with an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: 使用而不是 XpsDigitalSignature<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature>當您使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]文件。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature> is not [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]-aware, and does not guarantee that all parts in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document are fully signed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature>不是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]-感知，並不保證所有組件中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]文件會完整簽署。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature>

trans-unit.source: For more information about digital signatures, see the MSDN article *Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions* available at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關數位簽章的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN 文章︰*開放式封裝慣例的數位簽章架構*位於[http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] see the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]看到*XML Paper Specification (XPS)*下載[http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The associated digital signature for the package.
trans-unit.target: 封裝相關聯數位簽章。

trans-unit.source: The associated package.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的套件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether changing the properties of the document invalidates the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否會變更文件的內容導致無效的數位簽章。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if changing the properties of the document invalidates the signature; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果變更文件的屬性會導致無效的簽章;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_guid](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-guid-md.md)] of the signature.
trans-unit.target: 取得[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_guid](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-guid-md.md)]簽章。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] of the signature.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]簽章。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the signer's X.509 certificate is contained in the document <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出文件中是否包含簽署者的 X.509 憑證<xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate of the signer is embedded by the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> method when called with the `embedCertificate` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 簽署者的 X.509 憑證內嵌<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>方法呼叫時`embedCertificate`參數設定為`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on digital signatures and certificates, see Section 3.3 Digital Signatures in the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關數位簽章和憑證的詳細資訊，請參閱 > 一節 3.3 數位簽章中*開放式封裝慣例*規格下載[http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the X.509 certificate of the signer is embedded in the document <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果簽署者的 X.509 憑證內嵌在文件<xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the digital signature is invalidated if someone else signs the package.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示數位簽章是否會失效，是否其他人簽署封裝。

trans-unit.source: The signature origin restriction is set by the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> method when called with the `restrictions` parameter set to exclude the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions> part.
trans-unit.target: 簽章原點限制由設定<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>方法呼叫時`restrictions`參數設定為排除<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions>組件</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions></xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a document is to be signed by more than one person, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions> part needs to be excluded from the signature when the document is first signed.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件是由多人，簽署<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions>部分需要先簽署文件時，會排除簽章。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions>

trans-unit.source: (Exclusions are specified in the `restrictions` parameter of the call to <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>.) If the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions> part is not excluded, any additional signatures invalidate the signature of the first signer.
trans-unit.target: (排除項目中指定`restrictions`參數呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>。)</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>如果<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions>的組件不在排除、 任何其他的簽章失效的第一個簽署的簽章。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the Core Properties and Signature Origin parts, see Chapter 3 of the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關核心屬性和簽章來源組件的詳細資訊，請參閱第 3 章的*開放式封裝慣例*規格下載[http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the signature is invalidated if an additional digital signature is applied; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果簽章無效，如果套用到其他的數位簽章。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_url](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-url-md.md)] string that identifies the signature type.
trans-unit.target: 取得[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_url](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-url-md.md)]識別簽章類型的字串。

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_url](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-url-md.md)] string that identifies the signature type.
trans-unit.target: A[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_url](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-url-md.md)]識別簽章類型的字串。

trans-unit.source: The default signature type is <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NTransformUrl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設簽章的類型是<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NTransformUrl"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the encrypted hash value of the signature.
trans-unit.target: 取得簽章的加密雜湊值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Byte> array that contains the encrypted hash value of the signature.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Byte>陣列，包含簽章的加密雜湊值。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: Gets the document sequence reader for the signed document sequence.
trans-unit.target: 取得文件順序讀取器為帶正負號的文件順序。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader"></xref>; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if not all valid [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] parts have been signed in the document.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader"> </xref>; 或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果所有有效[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]在文件組件已登入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the X.509 certificate of the signer.
trans-unit.target: 取得簽署者的 X.509 憑證。

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate of the signer is embedded by the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> method when called with the `embedCertificate` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 簽署者的 X.509 憑證內嵌<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>方法呼叫時`embedCertificate`參數設定為`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on digital signatures and certificates, see Section 3.3 Digital Signatures in the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關數位簽章和憑證的詳細資訊，請參閱 > 一節 3.3 數位簽章中*開放式封裝慣例*規格下載[http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate of the signer; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> when there is no certificate embedded in the document package.
trans-unit.target: X.509 憑證簽署者;或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>時沒有內嵌在文件封裝中的憑證。

trans-unit.source: Gets the date and time when the signature was created.
trans-unit.target: 取得簽章建立時的時間與日期。

trans-unit.source: SigningTime is based on the system time of the computer where the signing took place.
trans-unit.target: SigningTime 根據的電腦所在的簽章已進行的系統時間。

trans-unit.source: SigningTime is not a "secure Time Stamp" and is not from trusted Time Stamp Authority.
trans-unit.target: SigningTime 不是 「 安全時間戳記 」，而不是來自受信任的時間戳記授權單位。

trans-unit.source: A secure TimeStamp must be obtained and applied through a trusted Time Stamp Authority.
trans-unit.target: 安全時間戳記必須取得並套用到受信任的時間戳記授權單位。

trans-unit.source: The date and time when the pages, document, or document sequence was signed.
trans-unit.target: 已簽署的日期和時間頁面中，當文件或文件順序。

trans-unit.source: Verifies the document digital signature against the X.509 certificate embedded in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 驗證對 X.509 憑證內嵌在文件數位簽章[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This overload method verifies the document digital signature against the X.509 certificate embedded by the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> method when called with the `embedCertificate` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載方法驗證文件數位簽章對 X.509 憑證內嵌<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>方法呼叫時`embedCertificate`參數設定為`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref> enumeration values that specify the result of the verification attempt.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref>指定驗證嘗試結果之列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Verifies the document digital signature against a specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 驗證指定的 X.509 憑證對文件數位簽章。

trans-unit.source: The certificate of authenticity for the signer.
trans-unit.target: 簽署者真確性的憑證。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref> enumeration values that specify the result of the verification attempt.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref>指定驗證嘗試結果之列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Verifies the X.509 certificate embedded in the package.
trans-unit.target: 驗證內嵌在封裝的 X.509 憑證。

trans-unit.source: Your application will need to decide what flags are critical for verifying certificates.
trans-unit.target: 您的應用程式必須決定哪些旗標不可或缺的驗證憑證。

trans-unit.source: Some certificate verifications may require Internet connectivity.
trans-unit.target: 某些憑證的驗證可能會需要網際網路連線。

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate of the signer is embedded by the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> method when called with the `embedCertificate` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 簽署者的 X.509 憑證內嵌<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>方法呼叫時`embedCertificate`參數設定為`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify the result of the verification attempt.
trans-unit.target: 指定驗證嘗試結果之列舉值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: Verifies the specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 驗證指定的 X.509 憑證。

trans-unit.source: Your application will need to decide what flags are critical for verifying certificates.
trans-unit.target: 您的應用程式必須決定哪些旗標不可或缺的驗證憑證。

trans-unit.source: Some certificate verifications may require Internet connectivity.
trans-unit.target: 某些憑證的驗證可能會需要網際網路連線。

trans-unit.source: A certificate of authenticity.
trans-unit.target: 真品證明書。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify the result of the verification attempt.
trans-unit.target: 指定驗證嘗試結果之列舉值的位元組合。
